Description.Text: Get more of what you need, when you stay at the Hawthorn Suites by Wyndham LTD, one of the leading extended stay hotels in Manhattan Beach, California near the LAX, Los Angeles Airport. We are located 1 mile from the Beach. Located just four miles south of Los Angeles International Airport and 22 miles SW from Downtown Los Angeles, this extended stay hotel features studio and one-bedroom suites with luxurious pillow top beds. Studio suites offer a wet bar area with microwave and refrigerator, 1 Bedroom Suites offer a fully equipped kitchen featuring a two burner cook top, microwave, dishwasher, refrigerator and all the pots, pans, dishes and utensils needed for an extended stay. For the benefit of our guests, we are also proud to announce that this hotel and it's premises are now completely smoke free, except for designated smoking areas. This hotel is also conveniently near major business centers such as AT and T, DCMDW, Hughes, Lockheed Martin, Mattel Toys and TRW as well as near local attractions including area beaches, the Hollywood, Disneyland Resort and Knotts Berry Farm. Other amenities include wireless high-speed Internet access in all rooms, an exercise room, coffee makers and free parking. Start your day right with our complimentary hot breakfast buffet including eggs, bacon/sausage, fresh fruit, cereals, hot coffee and much, much more. Then unwind at our complimentary Wednesday evening social. So come stay at the Hawthorn Suites by Wyndham hotel in Manhattan Beach for a comfortable and convenient extended stay or weekend getaway in Los Angeles in the LAX area. Reserve your room online today.
We are located 1 mile from the Beach. Located just four miles south of Los Angeles International Airport and 22 miles SW from Downtown Los Angeles.
